Silvestrovská oslava v
CASABLANCA SKY BAR

31.12. 2023 od 21:00 / 23:00

Be the center of attention at the stylish Casablanca Sky Bar on the roof of The President hotel, where the most exclusive celebrations take place.

Come and celebrate an unforgettable night with us under the open sky, featuring a premium buffet dinner, special performances, a private fireworks display, DJs, and other dazzling surprises.

ABOUT US

The atmosphere, Style & The View!
Discover our brand new skybar located on the 6th floor with amazing panoramatic view over the city.

BOOK NOW
SKY BAR

Casablanca

Embark on a journey at our recently inaugurated skybar, perched on the 6th floor, where an enticing trifecta of atmosphere, style, and breathtaking views awaits. Immerse yourself in the warm embrace of our carefully curated ambiance, accentuated by contemporary design elements that elevate the overall experience.

As you revel in the panoramic vistas that stretch across the city, allow us to indulge your senses with a diverse array of delectable drinks. Our bar boasts a meticulously crafted selection of libations that cater to every palate.

BOOK A TABLE

Bookings can be made up to 30 days ahead of time. Kindly observe our dress policy, which is Smart Casual. We maintain the discretion to deny admission. Pets are not allowed.
